gram_identity

gram.js API

Globals / gram-identity

Package: gram-identity

(ast)-[identify]->(ast)

Collection of identity generating functions and an AST processing plugin which applies identity to any paths which have none.

How to gram-identity

Install:

npm install @gram-data/gram-builder

Build an AST:

import { node, edge } from '@gram-data/gram-builder';

const left = node('a');
const right = node('b');
const ast = edge([left, right], 'right');

Next Steps

  • Enrich record properties with js objects using gram-value
  • Serializes to a string using gram-stringify
  • Introspect the AST using gram-ast

About gram.js

Gram is a textual format for data graphs.
